weekly picks (Aug 1 week 2023)

Posted on August 1, 2023 in 2023aug,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2023 Aug 1st week collection

  1. s41467-023-40335-5 Topological solitonic macromolecules (Nature Communications)

  2. 2307.14542 Symmetry of the emergent inductance tensor exhibited by magnetic textures (arXiv)

  3. 2307.16697 Electron correlations and superconductivity in La$_3$Ni$_2$O$_7$ under pressure tuning (arXiv)

  4. 2307.15784 Superconducting-Spin Reorientation in Spin-Triplet Multiple Superconducting Phases of UTe2 (arXiv)

  5. 2307.16853 Spin-frame field theory of a three-sublattice antiferromagnet (arXiv)

  6. 2307.16038 Ancilla wavefunctions of Mott insulator and pseudogap metal through quantum teleportation (arXiv)

  7. 2307.15828 Epitaxial Kagome Thin Films as a Platform for Topological Flat Bands (arXiv)

  8. 2307.16827 Nonlinearity-induced topological phase transition characterized by the nonlinear Chern number (arXiv)

  9. 2307.15923 Charge-Spin Conversion in Two-Subband Quantum Wells with Conventional and Unconventional Rashba Spin-Orbit Coupling (arXiv)

  10. 2307.16025 Swapping exchange and spin-orbit induced correlated phases in ex-so-tic van der Waals heterostructures (arXiv)

  11. 2307.15769 Magnetic Antiskyrmions in Two-Dimensional van der Waals Magnets Engineered by Layer Stacking (arXiv)

  12. PhysRevLett.131.056401 Intrinsic Nonlinear Hall Detection of the N\‘eel Vector for Two-Dimensional Antiferromagnetic Spintronics (PRL)

  13. 2307.15162 Majorana bound states in d-wave superconductor planar Josephson junction (majorana, arXiv)

  14. 2307.15706 Type II t-J model and shared antiferromagnetic spin coupling from Hund’s rule in superconducting La$_3$Ni$_2$O$_7$ (Hanbit YHZhang, arXiv)

  15. 2307.15654 Strong tunable coupling between two distant superconducting spin qubits (arXiv)

  16. 2307.15680 Crossover from Non-Fermi-Liquid to Pseudogap Behavior in the Spectral of Local Impurity in Power-Law Diverging Multichannel Kondo Model (kondo, arXiv)

  17. 2307.15652 Spin Hall conductivity in the Kane-Mele-Hubbard model at finite temperature (Tremblay, arXiv)

  18. 2307.15392 Electronic structure and lattice dynamics of 1T-VSe$_2$: origin of the 3D-CDW (VSe2, arXiv)

  19. 2307.15119 Nematic metal in a multi-valley electron gas: Variational Monte Carlo analysis and application to AlAs (nematic metal, arXiv)

  20. 2307.15603 Nonlinear optical diode effect in a magnetic Weyl semimetal (arXiv)

  21. 2307.15319 Compact Localized States in Electric Circuit Flatband Lattices (flatband CLS, arXiv)
